int main()
{
    int t,j,k,p,n,rem,c,sum,x;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while (t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            scanf("%d", &p);
            for(k=1;k<=p;k++)
            {
                c=1;
                sum=0;
                x=k;
                do
                {
                    rem=x%2;
                    sum=sum+(c*rem);
                    x=x/2;
                    c=c*10;
                }while(x>0);
                printf("%d ", sum);
            } 
        }
        printf("\n");
    }          
    return 0;
}
